welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Crau, a charming city nestled in the heart of Provence known for its breathtaking landscapes and Provençal way of life. We hope you have a wonderful stay and discover all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your time in La Crau!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Palyvestre Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Le Palyvestre Airport offers exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Le Castellet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Mole Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Mole Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
